author: jeremy
msg: added the ability to configure the transformer with an absolute filepath in the 'directory' parameter, to facilitate keeping indexes in locations other than the Servlet Temp folder, which is problematic in Jetty (as Jetty deletes this on restart)

author: crossley
msg: Used mac2unix to fix these line-endings issues.

author: sylvain
msg: Remove dependency of flow on Environment: replaced by Redirector

author: sylvain
msg: Robustify against buggy SAX events with a null namespace URI
